t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection

t: Project Zero | Block, remove, and prevent counterfeits
s: Drive counterfeits to zero with Amazon. Combine our automated protections and the power of serialization with the ability to immediately remove counterfeit listings from Amazon stores.
